pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, May 30, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister, Minister of Public Safety Marco Mendicino, Minister of Justice and Attorney General of Canada David Lametti, Minister for Women and Gender Equality and Youth Marci Ien, and President of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada and Minister of Emergency Preparedness Bill Blair will make an announcement and hold a media availability. Minister of Canadian Heritage and Quebec Lieutenant Pablo Rodriguez will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:45 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong.
